overview.heading: Overview
overview.description: COBOL Blitz is a shooter game in which the player uses a laser cannon to defend himself against the invasion of aliens troops. The goal is to destroy the troops and prevent them from reaching the bottom of the screen.

step.description: To run this demonstration in Visual Studio:

steps.step: To start the game, press any key.
To move the cannon, press the left or right arrow key.
To fire the cannon, press Space.
To pause the game, press ESC.
The number of lives that you have left is at the upper left corner.
Your scores are displayed in the upper right corner.
